title: Anti-Spam System
description: Developed an anti-spam system using machine learning techniques for spam detection. Implemented classification models with natural language processing to filter out spam messages, trained on various datasets.

title: Multiplayer Game
description: Created a real-time multiplayer game allowing up to 4 players to compete simultaneously. Integrated Photon Networking for seamless player interaction with engaging gameplay mechanics.

title: Medical Records Management System
description: Developed a Java-based system for managing patient medical records. Implemented a secure database architecture ensuring GDPR compliance.

title: Company Website for NetCompany
description: Built a responsive company website, showcasing services, team, and projects with third-party API integration for enhanced user experience.
